name: Detective Knight: Rogue
description: As Los Angeles prepares for Halloween, mask-wearing armed robbers critically wound detective James Knight's partner in a shootout following a heist.

review.author: noshouse
review.heading: Be a strategic person. With every move you make, it's either about strengthening your own position or intimidating the enemy
review.reviewBody: Although it's a detective movie from the Bruce Willis series, you can tell that the production scale is much smaller. After watching this movie, it really feels like it's not as engaging as it should be. I'd recommend streaming it online. It makes me miss the old Die Hard series of films, watching Bruce Willis and his partner team up to navigate large-scale scenarios, busy solving various puzzles set by the villains. Especially the famous 5-liter and 3-liter bucket puzzle to get 4 liters of water, and the international cybersecurity issue of the nationwide blackout by hackers. These smaller-scale problems seem confined to the petty crimes and personal grudges of small-time villains. It feels more like watching a TV series.
